This is me

Holidaying in Vietnam

It's harder than it looks..

I'm a Computer geek from Chennai, India. I'm currently going to the Johns Hopkins university in Baltimore, Maryland to get my Masters degree in Computer Science. I used to work for Amazon as a SDET and there I became very well acquainted with the Android Stack and the internals of Android. I'm always hacking away at something and my crowning achievement till date is a Raspberry PI controlled Television interface that makes use of MythTV to block out pesky commercials (Indian television has a lot of these). I'm very passionate about ROMs for Android and regulary sync the Android and CyanogenMod source trees and make my own hacks that i can then try on my , now dying, Nexus 5.
I am also a compulsive hackathon go-er and lifehacker.

These are my affiliations

SDET, Kindle division

B.E Computer Science and Engineering
